Your Facebook account is not linked to any DietiDeals24 account of this type. Please, signup.
Your Facebook account is already linked to a DietiDeals24 account of this type. Please, signin.
Successful linking to Facebook account. Please wait.

A silent auction is an auction that can be created by a seller-type account. It is characterized by an expiration date, by which buyer-type accounts can bid sums that are secret (thus not viewable by other buyers) to the seller. The good or service will be awarded to the buyer whose bid has been accepted by the seller. The seller may at any time view the buyers\' bids and reject an arbitrary number of them, but accept only one.

An inverse auction is an auction that can be created by a buyer-type account. It is characterized by an expiration date, by which seller-type accounts can offer amounts less than the current lowest bid. The buyer can also enter a maximum price he or she is willing to pay, which will become the starting price of the auction. If no seller bids an amount equal to or less than this initial threshold, the auction is declared to have failed when the deadline arrives. At the time of the deadline, the seller who bid the lowest amount is awarded the good or service.

A fixed-time auction is an auction that can be created by a seller-type account. It is characterized by an expiration date, by which buyer-type accounts can bid amounts greater than the highest current bid. The seller can also enter a secret minimum price (thus not viewable to any user except the seller). If no buyer bids an amount equal to or greater than this minimum threshold, the auction is declared to have failed when the deadline arrives. At the time of the deadline, the buyer who bid the highest amount is awarded the good or service.
Choose the type of auction to create

How can you join an auction?

"How can you see the other people's bids to your auction? "
How can you see the auctions you joined to?
How can you edit you profile?
Once logged in, on the navbar press the button

An alert will popup to confirm your bid. Insert the amount you want to bid (it must be greater than 0 $) and press \'OK\' to confirm your bid. Beware, you won\'t be able to withdraw it anymore. Otherwise, if you change your mind, you can go back to the auction details pressing the \'Cancel\' button.

A page with all the auctions you can join to will appear. Select the auction you want to join to. A summary of the auction\'s information will be presented. When you want to bid, on the bottom of the page press the button

A popup with the types of auction you can create will appear. Select the type in the menu and press the \'OK\' button. A page where you can insert the auction\'s information will appear (all the fields are mandatory but the image). When you\'re done, press the button
on the bottom of the page.
A page where you can access various functionalities will appear. Select the button
All active and no longer active (either failed or won) auctions created by you will be listed.

All active and no longer active (either failed or won) auctions will be listed. Find the auction\'s card of which you want to edit the details, then press the button on the top-right corner of the screen
A page where you can edit single fields will appear. When you\'re done, press
on the bottom of the page. If you change your mind, you can revert all the modifications by using the button on the top-left of the screen
Otherwise, you can edit your auction even from the auction\'s details page. You can\'t edit a closed auction, though.
All active and no longer active (either failed or won) auctions will be listed. Find the auction\'s card that you want to delete, then press the button

An alert will popup to confirm the deletion. Press \'OK\' to confirm the action. If you change your mind, press \'Cancel\'. Otherwise, you can delete you auction even in the auction\'s details screen.
All active and no longer active (either failed or won) auctions you gave your bid to at least one time will be listed.
All active and no longer active (either failed or won) auctions will be listed. Find the auction\'s card of which you want to see the bids, then press the button

A page with a list of users who made a bid will appear. Here you can check out their username, how much they bid and when. If your auction is silent, here you can also reject the bids or accept one of them. Use

to confirm a bid. A confirmation popup will appear. Select \'OK\' to confirm acceptance. All other offers will be automatically rejected. If you change your mind, press \'Cancel\' to return to the list of offers. If you press

you can decline the individual bid. A confirmation popup will appear. Select \'OK\' to confirm your rejection. All other bids will not be affected. If you change your mind, press \'Cancel\' to return to the list of bids. Otherwise, you can also view bids for your auction in the details screen. You can always view bids for your auction, even when it is over.
Now you can edit the information in the individual fields. When you are done, press the button on the top-right of the screen
All your information will be listed. In the bottom-right of the screen, press
to confirm the changes. If you change your mind, you can revert all the modifications by using the button on the top-left of the screen
The username was already used to create a profile by another user.
If you leave this page, the newly inserted data into the fields will be erased. You want to proceed?
Are you sure you want to delete this auction? You won\'t be able to recover it.
